projects.title: Road Trip Planner
projects.bodyText: Start your journey by entering your chosen origin and destination, and indulge your explorer's heart with a curated list of nearby attractions detailing the address and attraction rating.

projects.title: Acebook Mern Water
projects.bodyText: Social platform, equipped with user-friendly features like user registration, post creation, commenting, and liking functionality, fosters seamless communication and engagement within our vibrant community, making it a hub for meaningful interactions.

projects.title: Scar MakersBnB
projects.bodyText: Scar Makers BNB is an accommodation search service that simplifies the process of finding and booking spaces for travellers.

projects.title: Bank Tech Test
projects.bodyText: The program allows users to perform financial transactions, including depositing funds, making withdrawals, and viewing transaction history.
